firstSection.subHeader: We are not just a gym
firstSection.bodyOne: We are an energy center, where women shine brightly and exceed boundaries.
firstSection.bodyTwo: Our modern gym is a hub for bold and courageous women.
firstSection.bodyThree: From enchanting dance sessions to the latest workouts, Sway Gym is where your fitness journey transforms into an exciting adventure. Get ready to experience strength, fun, and friendship like never before.

secondSection.header: Sway is the rhythm of change in the Kingdom
secondSection.body: At Sway Gym, we envision a kingdom that welcomes every woman with her unique strength, whether it comes from within or outside. We strive to be the rhythm of positive change, creating a community flourishing with strength, well-being, and joy.

infoCards.title: Community
infoCards.body: We believe in the power of a supportive community, where friendships form, and everyone encourages each other towards their fitness goals.

infoCards.title: Inclusivity
infoCards.body: We embrace diversity and create a place where every woman feels welcome, regardless of age, experience, or fitness level.

infoCards.title: No Judgment
infoCards.body: In Sway Gym, we support an area for women to be themselves, free from judgment or criticism.

infoCards.title: Passion
infoCards.body: We are passionate about helping women lead healthier, happier lives. Our commitment to excellence drives us to continuous improvement and surpassing expectations.

home.addressFirstLineDetails: Shoala District - Bahja Street - Building No. 3086
